long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your browsing experience with the Dynamic Tab Title Updater! This extension automatically updates your browser tab titles based on specific keywords found on the page, helping you stay organised and easily identify important information.

Features:

- Automatic Tab Title Customisation: The extension scans for specific phrases like "Service Ticket", "Purchase Order", "Opportunity", "Sales Order", and "Project Ticket" on the page, and replaces them with concise abbreviations like "SR", "PO", "Op", "SO", and "PT" in the tab title.
  
- Real-Time Monitoring: With the built-in MutationObserver, the extension continuously monitors changes to the page, ensuring your tab title is always up-to-date even as new content is loaded or modified.

- Seamless Integration: The extension runs automatically in the background without any setup required. Just install it and enjoy the improved tab management.

- Effortless Organisation: Ideal for professionals working with multiple tabs related to service tickets, purchase orders, or project management, making it easy to keep track of key tasks and documents.
